@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.resources

Interfaces and reference implementations of core resource service and its components.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResourceManager
    An object responsible for managing registrations of Resource instances.
    ResourceManagerFactory
    The ResourceManagerFactory creates ResourceManager instances.
    ResourceNamesSupplier
    A class that can supply a set multimap of Listener classes to Resource names.
    ResourceProvider
    An object responsible for providing Resource instances.
    ResourceProvider.Builder
    A builder for creating resource provider instances.
    ResourceProviderFactory
    The ResourceProviderFactory creates ResourceProvider instances.
    ResourceService
    An object with an operational state providing access to the underlying resource provider and manager.
    ResourceService.Builder
    A builder for creating resource service instances.
    ResourceServiceFactory
    The ResourceServiceFactory creates ResourceService instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractResourceManager
    An abstract implementation of ResourceManager.
    AbstractResourceProvider
    An abstract implementation of ResourceProvider.
    AbstractResourceService
    An abstract implementation of ResourceService.
    AbstractResourceService.AbstractBuilder<B extends AbstractResourceService.AbstractBuilder<B>>
    An abstract builder for creating resource service instances.
    ForwardingResourceManager
    A resource manager which forwards all its method calls to another resource manager.
    ForwardingResourceProvider
    A resource provider which forwards all its method calls to another resource provider.
    ResourceManagers
    Static utility methods pertaining to ResourceManager instances.
    ResourceProviders
    Static utility methods pertaining to ResourceProvider instances.
    ResourceServices
    Static utility methods pertaining to ResourceService instances.

Package sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.resources Description
